Reviews.Title: “More than my expectations”
Reviews.Author: Junaid H
Reviews.Content: wife travelled beginning september 6 nights searched 100 hotels intially budget pretty tight finally konak expected pictures website amazing experience extra ordinary budget hotel staff excellent special thanks manager responsible day shift owner polite helpful throughout booking stay hotel overall loved hospitality extra helpful questions queries forward location exactly quiet 1 min walk closest station gulhane walking distance famous spots blue mosque cistern haga sophia spice bazaar etc love stay revisited

Reviews.Title: “a great affordable hotel located in the heart of old istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Omar D
Reviews.Content: booked triple nights neat tidy hotel situated heart istanbul close major attractions short walk promenade staff extremely polite especially front office manager miss breakfast simply delicious set busy day haggling various street retail sellers food hotel keenly priced appetising lot cheaper food establishments main roadthe management staff happily organise day excursions istanbul time allows book hotel advance popular international visitors turkish nationals hotel reasonably priced worth money cleaned bedding towels changed day air conditioning mini barfridge tv strongly recommend hotel book

Reviews.Title: “well... it's a place to crash”
Reviews.Author: longsong
Reviews.Content: hotel close bunch city attractions thats else average average average clean change towels clean day stuff nasty smell coming bathroom sometimes theyre terrace roof supposed restaurant breakfasts breakfasts scarce coffee terrible staff isnt particularly friendly aggressive rude helpful booked double bed moved twin beds oh stayed week half paid 84 euros night probably couldve found money lazy look book urgently book 5th floor balcony sweet view hagya sofia left street view living windows facing wall

Reviews.Title: “very comfatable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tomo2316
Reviews.Content: location perfect takes minutes walk topkapi castle 10 minutes blue mosque etc clean comfortable perfect view breakfast especially hotel stuff nice friendly everyday hello glass apple tea

Reviews.Title: “Good location; decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: mzwebby
Reviews.Content: location hotel nice close main attractions historic istanbul dont lots frills bit cramped 2 people shelf wall located pillows youre careful youll banging forehead hotel clean staff fairly helpful english limited staff balconies view hagia sophia night recommend hotel suspect

Reviews.Title: “Lots of Character... Not lots of space”
Reviews.Author: TravelingTim77
Reviews.Content: loved hotel quaint charming lots character views terrace restaurant spectacular mornings bosphorus direction asia hagia sofia direction beautiful heart istanbul able wonder city quiet cafe setting food wonderful service class staff address questions issues encountered delight excuse sit properly toilet drape leg shower peeked spacious definitely doublebed 2 single beds cramped id happy staying hotel fine staying insist cheaper price

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful welcome and fantastic service in the heart of Istanbul!”
Reviews.Author: ddavis9581
Reviews.Content: location konak close sites location ideal enjoying central city transportation options city available restaurants numerous hotel hotel clean comfortable breakfast offers beautiful view city waterfront staff flexibility staff service impeccable wish demand istanbul city absolutely amazing history food incredible people welcoming im withdrawals shish kabobs baklava

Reviews.Title: “The Sude Konak is just right.”
Reviews.Author: lamyr1
Reviews.Content: location terrace staff keen service breakfast table pleasure enjoy trip manager helpful patient giving assistance answering questions lost card wish thank comfortable hotel walking distance sultanahmet district tram corner restaurants offer turkish menu ok

Reviews.Title: “Good value in great location”
Reviews.Author: LancasterLad
Reviews.Content: konak ideally located sirkeci sultanahmet 2 minute walk gulhane tram stop round corner north shield pub arrived hotel ankara 0900 expecting able dropoff luggage checkin 1400 surprise ready checkedin straight lobby fairly comfortable bar easy chairs free internet 5th floor unfortunately twin beds mind decent size minibar ac satellite tv bathroom fine breakfast buffet decent choice breakfast 6th floor roof terrace partly partly enclosed views breathtaking stayed 3 nights night sleep night double glazing quality heard call prayers deal booking wwwbookingcom regularly

Reviews.Title: “100 m to Blue Mosque and very pleasant boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: Femaleperspective
Reviews.Content: cad 24 sirkeci 212 513 2100 boutique hotel placed main tourist city 400 blue mosque 50 tram excellent personal clean furnishings modern tea coffee facility restaurant top building overlooks aya sophia bospherous moved sessions laptop eating quality scores based hotel provide swimming pool etc relief marbled type hotel staff helpful reception understand english opposite pleasant restaurant called turkish kitchen handy wear heels evening istanbul city comfortable sensible shoes lacked storage drawers wardrobe usual freebies provided front suffer road noise istanbul truly worlds cities highly recommended negative suggest alcohol free holiday plonk expensive â£50 bottle ordinary restaurant lots scams expect lots quoted euros payments euros seen bad behaviour people seats women drunks threatening yobs touch cats bitten naturally drawn decided rabies rare fatal hospital tatty quick free private hospital business preferred city business taksim city tea english tea cold milk

Reviews.Title: “good, clean, well organised and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: dreamtemplar
Reviews.Content: stayed numerous occasions hotel choice lovely istanbul clean professional staff nice helpful excellent chai breakfast havent checked restaurant times im late looks popular esp summer wonderful view sophia anyway laid warm cosy extremely cold winters cool summer bathroom internet connection starred stayed worse 4 starts istanbul
